goal: Allow users to upload their own JSON files, visually edit them using a clean form interface, and export the updated JSON file safely with no syntax errors.
core_features: Upload JSON file from user's computer
Generate editable UI based on JSON structure
Boolean values displayed as toggle switches
Number values displayed as numeric input fields
String values displayed as text boxes
Nested objects shown in collapsible sections
Arrays shown as editable lists with add/remove buttons
Each value must show its JSON key as a clear label
Live update of JSON object when values change
Reset to original uploaded file button

requirements: Scrollable sections for large JSON files

behavior_rules: All editing must happen client-side only
error_handling: Display message if file is not valid JSON
Prevent export if JSON becomes invalid
Handle empty or corrupted files gracefully
